description: a(n) gives the number of all non-right angle triangles with pair of legs (X(n)_j, Y(n)_j) and base Z(n), where X(n)_j = sqrt(x(n)_j), Y(n)_j = sqrt(y(n)_j) and Z(n) = sqrt(z(n)), with integers x(n)_j <= y(n)_j <= z(n), such that the areas A(n)_j are positive integers, for j = 1, 2, ..., a(n). This implies that z(n) = A334818(n), for n >= 1.
